text:
A Moment of Hesitation

Young man stands on the stairs, anxious.  
His thoughts swirl with doubt and fear.  
‘What if I let cowardice win?’  

---  

Outside, the heat and stench overwhelm him.  
‘Why am I going there now?’  
‘Is this a fantasy or a reality?’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man grapples with his fears and insecurities while navigating a suffocating and unpleasant environment.
